=====
Usage
=====

To use BOLD retriever in a project::

    >>> import bold
    >>> # ID Engine API http://www.boldsystems.org/index.php/resources/api?type=idengine
    >>> seq = ''
    >>> res = bold.call_id(seq, db='COX1')
    >>> res.id_from_bold
    'JSDPX043-08'
    >>> res.taxonomic_identification
    'Hymenopenaeus debilis'
